item.description: Join us for Winter Festivities! Best Friends is holding an all-dog meet-up group, just when you thought all the holiday parties were over. We have an indoor doggy playroom for exercise and excitment. Also new to Best Friends is our outdoor play yard!! Therefore the meet-up group can utilize both indoor and outdoor fun. They can play in the snow....or if it's too chilly come inside for some warm, delightful refreshments! All friendly dogs are welcome. Let your dogs socialize and make some new friends too. Call us if you have any questions: 860-721-8080, we'd love to see you there and meet your poochies!
item.how_to_find_us: Best FRiends Pet Care, 1511 Silas Deane Highway, Rocky Hill CT 06067

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Festivities!
